title: Did Vince McMahon of WWE guide Trump in the economy?
subtitle: The White House published a list of business leaders who said that they advised the President to reopen the American economy. Apparently, one name appeared.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The President of the United States, Donald Trump, used World Wrestling as the CEO of the Entertainment (Vince McMahon) as a consultant in reopening the American economy.
